text: Bae Mi-jung (born 18 July 1968) is a South Korean judoka. She competed at the 1987 World Judo Championships, in the -78 kg category, losing to Chinese Liu Aixiang. She won the silver medal at the 1988 Summer Olympics, where judo was for women a demonstration sport, in the half-heavyweight event losing in the final to Belgian world champion Ingrid Berghmans. == References == Category:1968 births Category:Judoka Category:Living people Category:South Korean martial artists
title: Bae Mi-jung
